text: super YEAH. just renewed my cert, but hey. iâ€™m here to advocate for an advanced course with API and serverless.
What other types of courses would you want to see on our academy for developers? Would love to get more ideas like the one above :slightly_smiling_face:
Not going to be out for a bit, but I'm currently working on two more API lessons that cover the CRM. Doing a little webhooks demo that uses serverless functions that I'm kinda excited about.

An entire course on how to increase page speed in the HubSpot CMS would be amazing, we've hired a few developers for this task and haven't seen great results despite all the current HubSpot documentation available on the topic

Great feedback Jen! 
We recently released this guide that may help in the short term: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/speed|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/speed>

We plan to keep expanding that guide with more detail and resources.

We also have this academy course which sounds like what you're looking for: 
<https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/website-optimization|https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/website-optimization>
Let us know if you have any feedback on either resource we want to keep iterating and providing useful information
Thanks! I'll forward this to our developers! I heard this topic mentioned in the CMS roundtable this morning as well so look forward to any new ...developments... :wink:

Usually you can fix a few low hanging fruit to improve page speed scores slightly, but after that you have to really re-write and possibly redesign entire pages with performance in mind from the get go.
What about in depth video guide for serverless function ??
